articles.content:
Medical compression is graded in mmHg. Stage 1 is low compression designed for fluid management immediately post-op. Shop Stage 1 Fajas.

Stage 2 offers high compression for sculpting and is typically worn after 4 weeks. Shop Stage 2 Waist Trainers.
